data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Addis Abeba, Ethiopia into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Addis Abeba, Ethiopia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Addis Abeba who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary: On average, 85 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Addis Abeba, Ethiopia.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Addis Abeba against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Addis Abeba.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Gwama people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, of the 1,113,859 people in the state of Addis Abeba who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 495,552 believers in Addis Abeba that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Addis Abeba, Ethiopia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Addis Abeba
location.people_groups_list: Harari, Oromo, Bale, Shabo, Oromo, Yejju, Somali
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Harari (51,000), Oromo, Bale (2,086,000), Shabo (500), Oromo, Yejju (578,000), Somali (7,280,000)
